channel.title: 6.2 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建
channel.description: Recent content in 6.2 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建

item.title: 6.2.4 的 Windows 版本
item.description: 备注 ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -DFEATURE_sql_xxx=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. 备注 Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build SChannel and OpenSSL backend plugin, with OpenSSL backend built with OpenSSL 3 series. Additionally, Visual Studio versions of Qt builds supports TLS 1.3 using SecureTransport. 备注 All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users.

item.title: 6.2.4 的 macOS 版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. 备注 Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build SecureTransport and OpenSSL backend plugin, with OpenSSL backend built with OpenSSL 3 series. 备注 All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 No QtWebEngine in this version. CVE issue patched All builds of Qt 6.

item.title: 6.2.4 的安卓版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. 备注 Since Qt 6.2 Qt made SSL backends as plugin. We build OpenSSL backend plugin with OpenSSL 3 series. 备注 All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 All builds are using NDK r23c with -DANDROID_NATIVE_API_LEVEL=24, it means the APK built using these packages may be not able to run on Android 7.

item.title: 6.2.4 的 WebAssembly 版本
item.description: 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -DFEATURE_sql_sqlite=ON -DFEATURE_system_sqlite=OFF. 备注 All builds have -DFEATURE_icu=OFF because I think the ICU library is too big and, in most of the conditions, useless for common users. 备注 All builds are using emscripten SDK 2.0.14 as recommended in Qt Wiki. All builds are with -DFEATURE_thread=ON. 备注 Qt for WebAssembly can’t be built to shared libs. CVE issue patched All builds have following CVEs fixed:
